about_more: Azimov Business Consultants is a boutique consulting firm providing professional services in ISO training and certification. The company was founded and is led by Khayot Azimov — an expert with many years of experience in international standards, management, and business consulting. We are an official partner of PECB (Professional Evaluation and Certification Board) — one of the leading international certification bodies. Through this partnership, we offer globally recognized accredited courses in key areas such as cybersecurity, data protection, quality management, business continuity, and digital transformation.
about_more_end: Our approach focuses on personalized support, flexible formats (online, offline, virtual classroom), modern training methodologies, and certifications that are truly valued in the market. We create conditions where learning becomes convenient, effective, and results-driven — whether for an individual professional, a corporate team, or an educational institution
mission_more: Our mission is to contribute to the development of Uzbekistan by implementing international standards of quality, safety, and sustainability. We aim to expand access to high-quality educational and certification programs, assisting professionals and organizations in meeting global requirements and remaining competitive in the international market.
mission_end: By offering ISO-standard training and certification in partnership with PECB, we help build a professional community prepared for the challenges of the digital era. Our approach is grounded in the principles of accessibility, transparency, and efficiency — to facilitate and simplify the path to excellence and global recognition.
video_des: Azimov Business Consultants is your reliable guide in the world of international standards. We offer ISO training and certification courses in partnership with a global leader — PECB.
01_avm_title: Over 200 professionals have completed training and received international certification with us
01_avm_des: We take pride in having helped hundreds of professionals from various industries enhance their qualifications and reach a new level.
02_avm_title: The first company in Uzbekistan to launch ISO 21001 certification courses accredited by PECB
02_avm_des: We pioneered the promotion of international standards in the field of education.
03_avm_title: Partnerships with 15+ organizations in Uzbekistan and abroad
03_avm_des: Our clients include private companies, educational institutions, and government organizations interested in improving quality and safety.
04_avm_title: Online and offline training in three languages: Uzbek, Russian, and English
04_avm_des: We make learning accessible and flexible, adapting to the needs of our participants
05_avm_title: 100% of our participants recommend us to their colleagues
05_avm_des: High levels of satisfaction and trust are our greatest reward.
leave_a_request: Leave a request and we will contact you shortly!
uz_partner_title: Official Government Portal of the Republic of Uzbekistan
uz_partner_bio: The Government Portal of the Republic of Uzbekistan is a fundamental component of the electronic information infrastructure for interaction among state bodies, as well as between legal entities and individuals.
pecb_partner_title: Building Digital Trust – Education and Certification
pecb_partner_bio: PECB is a leading certification body committed to strengthening digital trust through comprehensive education, certification, and training programs across various disciplines. We empower professionals to develop and showcase their expertise in digital security and beyond by offering world-class certification programs aligned with internationally recognized standards.
iaf_partner_title: IAF CertSearch is a global database of accredited certifications
iaf_partner_bio: IAF CertSearch was developed by the International Accreditation Forum (IAF) and its members to verify accredited certifications worldwide. It is a global database where users can search and validate the status of accredited certificates issued by certification bodies accredited by IAF signatory accreditation bodies, in accordance with the main scope of ISO/IEC 17021-1.
ozak_partner_bio: Akkred.uz is a leading accreditation center focused on building trust in the digital environment through high-quality education, certification, and conformity assessment programs. We support professionals in developing and validating their competencies in digital security and other key disciplines by offering world-class programs that meet ISO/IEC international standards and the requirements of global organizations such as APAC, ILAC, and IAF.
